              The Erigone Model Checker
      Copyright 2008-9 by Mordechai (Moti) Ben-Ari. GNU GPL.
              See copyright.txt

Download and open the archive erigone-N.zip, where N is the version
number. Open the archive in a clean directory. Further documentation on
the installation and use of Erigone can be found in the file erigone.pdf
in the subdirectory docs.

The source code is in the archive erigone-source-N.zip.
